resources.string: Mario - The iconic plumber known for rescuing Princess Peach in the Mushroom Kingdom.
Luigi - Mario\'s younger brother, often joining him on adventures.
Princess Peach - The kind-hearted ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom often kidnapped by Bowser.
Bowser - The arch-nemesis of Mario, a powerful, fire-breathing turtle-like creature aiming to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom.
Yoshi - A friendly dinosaur and Mario\'s loyal companion, known for eating enemies and flutter jumping.
Donkey Kong - A powerful yet good-natured ape often seen battling Mario.
Link - The courageous hero from The Legend of Zelda series, often tasked with rescuing Princess Zelda.
Zelda - The wise and resourceful princess from The Legend of Zelda series.
Sheik - Zelda\'s alter ego, a skilled warrior in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
Ganondorf - The primary antagonist in The Legend of Zelda series, seeking power and dominion.
Samus - A bounty hunter in a powered exoskeleton suit known from the Metroid series.
Kirby - A cute but powerful pink puffball known for inhaling enemies and copying their abilities.
Fox - The leader of the Star Fox team, an ace pilot skilled in space combat.
Falco - A skilled and cocky member of the Star Fox team, known for his rivalry with Fox.
Pikachu - The iconic electric-type Pokémon known for its lightning abilities.
Jigglypuff - A singing Pokémon that lulls opponents to sleep with its melodies.
Captain Falcon - A bounty hunter and skilled racer, famous for his powerful Falcon Punch move in the F-Zero series.
Ness - A young psychic boy from the EarthBound series with psychic powers.
Ice Climbers - A duo of characters, Popo and Nana, working together to climb icy mountains.
Marth - A prince from the Fire Emblem series, known for his swordsmanship and honor.
Mr. Game & Watch - A flat 2D character with various abilities from the Game & Watch series.
Diddy Kong - Donkey Kong\'s nimble and quick-witted nephew, often joining him on adventures.
Toon Link - The cartoonish version of Link from The Legend of Zelda series.
Zero Suit Samus - Samus without her powered suit, showcasing her agility and speed.
Meta Knight - A mysterious and powerful swordsman from the Kirby series.
King Dedede - A penguin-like character from the Kirby series, often seen as both a rival and friend of Kirby.
Wolf - A rival of Fox and a skilled pilot from the Star Fox series.
Pokémon Trainer - A character who commands Squirtle, Ivysaur, and Charizard in battle.
Lucario - A powerful Aura Pokémon known for its martial arts abilities.
Lucas - A character from the Mother/EarthBound series known for his PSI abilities and kind-hearted nature.
